name: Better With Friends
description:
Controls:

  • Use arrow keys to move
  • Z and X to rotate
  • R to restart

Clump together with your friends to help you reach the end. You can't leave the dotted-line boundaries but your friends can. Watch out for the bad guys, you might lose some of your friends, or be forced to restart.

Don't forget to click the game to give it focus (so that it can detect your key presses)

Made for the Curdle Jam in 6kb (minified and zipped)

Note: there are still bugs where it might crash
